resources.string: Keeping up the development of an app like this is not free, and with your donation you make sure that the app keeps working as for long as possible. All the elements below do not give you any advantage, they are simply for allowing you to support the development of the app.
The app will keep running longer thanks to you! You are an amazing person! Thank you very much! Here\'s a cookie to thank you for your donation.
